Read attribute dataframe from NetCDF-DSG file

Source: R/read_attribute_data.R
read_attribute_data.Rd

Gets attribute data from a NetCDF-DSG file and returns it in a data.frame. This function is intended as a convenience to be used within workflows where the netCDF file is already open and well understood.

read_attribute_data(nc, instance_dim)

Arguments

nc

A NetCDF path or urlto be opened.
instance_dim

The NetCDF instance/station dimension.

Examples

read_attribute_data,Read attribute dataframe from NetCDF-DSG file,Read attribute dataframe from NetCDF-DSG file — read_attribute_data,Source: R/read_attribute_data.R,read_attribute_data.Rd,character(0),read_attribute_data,character(0),list(title = "Description", contents = "
Gets attribute data from a NetCDF-DSG file and returns it in a data.frame.\nThis function is intended as a convenience to be used within workflows where\nthe netCDF file is already open and well understood.
"),list(description = "Gets attribute data from a NetCDF-DSG file and returns it in a data.frame.\nThis function is intended as a convenience to be used within workflows where\nthe netCDF file is already open and well understood."),read_attribute_data(nc, instance_dim),list(list(name = "nc", description = "
A NetCDF path or urlto be opened.
"), list(name = "instance_dim", description = "
The NetCDF instance/station dimension.
")),TRUE,
hucPolygons <- sf::read_sf(system.file('extdata','example_huc_eta.json', package = 'ncdfgeom'))
hucPolygons_nc <- ncdfgeom::write_geometry(tempfile(), hucPolygons)

read_attribute_data(hucPolygons_nc, "instance")
